plot: A young man's actions in 1985 bring terror to the last place he ever wanted to harm and spark violence in a community that demanded to be heard.
title: Brixton 85
plot_es: A young man's actions in 1985 bring terror to the last place he ever wanted to harm and spark violence in a community that demanded to be heard.
plot_en: A young man's actions in 1985 bring terror to the last place he ever wanted to harm and spark violence in a community that demanded to be heard.
